definitions.definition: A word or phrase ( construction or idiom ) typical of or influenced by a Semitic language such as Arabic , Aramaic or Hebrew . ( Compare Romanism , Hebraism . )
Judaism ; Jewishness ( especially when seen as the thing to which anti-Semitism is opposed ) .

main_definition: ( countable ) A word or phrase ( construction or idiom ) typical of or influenced by a Semitic language such as Arabic , Aramaic or Hebrew . ( Compare Romanism , Hebraism . )
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , strict sense , rare ) Judaism ; Jewishness ( especially when seen as the thing to which anti-Semitism is opposed ) .
